title: Tuskegee Airmen National Historic Site: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Permits Special uses of National Park Service facilities are allowed by permit only. Click here to download Special Use Application and Special Use Permit forms. A fee may be charged for use of park facilities during and after normal operating hours. Special Use applications are approved at the discretion of the Park Superintendent. Mail all Special Use forms 4-6 weeks in advance of your requested event  to: Tuskegee Institute National Historic Site Attn: Shirley Baxter 1212 West Montgomery Road Tuskegee Institute, AL 36088 Phone: 334-727-3200 Reservations  Groups of 10 or more are asked to call 334/724-0922 at least one to two weeks in advance of their planned tour to make reservations. Schoolgroups must bring one chaperone for every 10 students. Visitors with special needs, please contact the park at least 4 weeks in advance of your visit and indicate the type of need you have.
